thread.title: 12-Year-Old Boy Arrested, Accused Of Pointing Gun At Girl’s Head Over Chicken Nugget
thread.title_full: 12-Year-Old Boy Arrested, Accused Of Pointing Gun At Girl’s Head Over Chicken Nugget

author: CBS New York
title: 12-Year-Old Boy Arrested, Accused Of Pointing Gun At Girl’s Head Over Chicken Nugget
text:
12-Year-Old Boy Arrested, Accused Of Pointing Gun At Girl’s Head Over Chicken Nugget January 12, 2017 3:46 PM An awning stands over a McDonald's entrance in lower Manhattan on February 9, 2015. (Photo by Spencer Platt/Getty Images) 
NEW YORK (CBSNewYork) — A 12-year-old boy was arrested after allegedly demanding a chicken nugget from a female classmate at gunpoint earlier this week. 
The boy, a student at Harlem Democracy Prep School, first approached the girl and asked her for a Chicken McNugget inside a McDonald’s on East 103rd Street on Tuesday. 
The girl, also 12, refused to share and then walked to a nearby subway station. 
The boy followed her onto a 6 train and allegedly pulled out a gun, pointed it at her head and again demanded a McNugget, according to police. 
The girl slapped the gun away and refused to hand over the food. She said she later saw the boy show the gun to a another teen on the train. 
The victim reported the incident to school staff the following day and the boy was arrested at the school. 
The weapon was not recovered. It is unclear if it was real.
